entry.title: The Root - Black Edition
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Bold Salts
Price: 19.99

The Root is one of our proudest achievements that took over 2 years to develop. Our mission was to create a flavor that reflected one of our favorite Rooty drinks.

  1. First, we built the rooty base of the flavor by carefully selecting and balancing spices and unique earth tones in minute amounts.
  2. Then, we endeavored to replicate the sweet syrupy goodness of the flavor.
  3. Once we got that exactly right, it was time to blend these two flavor profiles together! We took the rootiness and the sweetness (which we referred to as dark and light) and combined them. This last phase took the longest because we wanted to ensure we achieved the perfect balance between light and dark.

The result is a beautifully crafted E-juice that preserves the earthy authenticity of the flavor that is now enjoyable in your vaping device. Say goodbye to calories and cavities, The Root will satisfy your rooty cravings.

Now, with the Black Edition we took this flavor to the next level by amplifying our secret conduction making the taste and smell stronger with every puff you take. 

This collection is offered in 20 mg (2.0%) BoldSalts. It follows BC Compliance laws and on top of that, we've devised a proprietary nicotine blend that combines our Freebase and NicSalts to make the perfect nicotine hit in every Flaving device!

VG Ratios:

  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Cactus Jango - Black Edition
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Bold Salts
Price: 19.99

Cactus Jango is one of VanGo Vapes crown jewels. Released in 2017, it came out of a challenge to stand up and be a fruit flavored vape like no other. Containing unique fruits like Jackfruit, Lychee and Cactus with popping flavors like Strawberry and Mango that will keep you excited with every puff from your vape. 

Now, with the Black Edition we took this flavor to the next level by amplifying our secret recipe making the taste and smell stronger with every puff you take. 

This collection is offered in 20 mg (2.0%) BoldSalts. It follows BC Compliance laws and on top of that, we've devised a proprietary nicotine blend that combines our Freebase and NicSalts to make the perfect nicotine hit in every Flaving device!

VG Ratios:

  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Frozen Ophelia - Black Edition
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Bold Salts
Price: 19.99

Frozen Ophelia is our number one top selling flavor. We used our signature menthol blend that keeps you refreshed, but does not overwhelm the beautiful fruity mixture we combined with the menthol. We infused cactus fruit, mango, strawberry and kiwi to create a smooth a refreshing vaping experience that makes it the perfect all day vape. 

Now, with the Black Edition we took this flavor to the next level by amplifying our secret recipe making the taste and smell stronger with every puff you take. 

This collection is offered in 20 mg (2.0%) BoldSalts. It follows BC Compliance laws and on top of that, we've devised a proprietary nicotine blend that combines our Freebase and NicSalts to make the perfect nicotine hit in every Flaving device!

VG Ratios:

  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: STLTH Pod Pack - Tobacco Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Stlth
Price: 14.99

These pods taste like a medium tobacco blend flavor.

  • Each pack contains 3 pod cartridges
  • 2.0 mL of E-liquid per cartridge

The nicotine blend is proprietary, purposely made to be extra smooth to accommodate adult smokers who are looking to switch from traditional tobacco.

Specifically crafted range of flavors, designed specifically for STLTH, come in three nicotine strengths 20mg/mL, 35mg/mL and 50mg/mL. We recommend trying the 20mg/mL first.

entry.title: Fruity Pack - 180 mL
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Quenchers

For this combo, we've packaged some of VanGo's favorite sweet and fruity flaves, so here's a range of three juicy flavors for your next all day vape!

Getem Grape, Sweet Citrus and Pinaculars are all here so Start Flaving with some of our best!

entry.title: VAEP
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: VAEP
Price: 27.99

Vaping Advocacy and Education Project Inc.

  • Through advocacy and education, disseminate to the general population accurate and comprehensive information about vaping.
  • Ensure smokers can make an informed decision about vaping as a smoking alternative.

For every bottle purchased ALL the proceeds go to VAEP.

When you buy a bottle you are helping and supporting people quit smoking and eventually saving their lives!

Join www.vaepworld.com for more information.

entry.title: Citrus Jive
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Shiver
Price: 14.99 - 49.99 (19 variants)

A perfectly sweet and tart combination of lemons and lime bursting with juicy tangerines and freshly squeezed oranges, slightly cooled to the perfect level! 

This flavor uses a different variation of menthol compared to our Frozen collection. The menthol is much lighter that doesn't feel like it overwhelms your palate, but still has that cool and refreshing note. 

VG Ratios:

  • 0, 3 and 6mg - 70% VG
  • 12 and 18mg - 65% VG
  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Discontinued / Custom eJuice
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type:
Price: 59.99

Feeling Nostalgic for the VanGo Classics? You can still get your discontinued or changed-recipe juices. Please contact us for any more detailed requests.

We also allow customized flavours. For example, if you would like Frozen Ophelia in 2mg and max PG, here is the place to do it. 

Please add the flavour to your cart, then in the shopping cart you can put in your special request like flavour name, nicotine amount and VG/PG ratio.

entry.title: Vaping Dream - Galleria (4 Flavors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Vaping Dream
Price: 48.99 - 93.99 (14 variants)

VanGo's classic favorites that pack a punch. Get this bundle and take a tour of our flavorful journey from sweet, creamy and tropical experience. (4 Flavors)﻿.

Ophelia - A fruity mango & strawberry concoction with subtle hints of cactus fruit & kiwi.

Amour - Passionate creamy yogurt with succulent raspberry notes.

Ichigo - A smooth flavorful blend of strawberries & cream with hints of vanilla & a slight drizzle of caramel.

Sophie - Strawberry, pineapple & guava. You've seen it before, but it's the flavor combination that'll have you coming back, tank after tank!

entry.title: Vaping Dream - Sugar Lane (3 Flavors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Vaping Dream
Price: 37.99 - 69.99 (14 variants)

A package filled with all your favorite sweet goodies to satisfy that sweet tooth. This package comes with our delectable candies (3 flavors).

Blue Strawberry (previously Blue Strawberry Cotton Candy) - Blueberries and strawberries swirled into fluffy deliciousness. 

Mellow Banana (previously Banana Candy) - The perfect banana flavored vape with its ultra smooth base and perfect sweetness.

Sour Power (previously Sour Belts) - Inhale the multilayered notes of tart fruits like lemon, lime and exhale the sweet strawberries and other berries.

entry.title: Vaping Dream - Coffee Shop (4 Flavors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Vaping Dream
Price: 48.99 - 90.99 (14 variants)

Since we are Canadian we couldn't resist not making a collection just for coffee. This bundle contains all your café goodies ﻿(4 flavors)﻿.

White Chocolate Mocha - Delicious over tones of white hot chocolate chunks and hints of nutty macadamia over sweetened vanilla.

Caramel Macchiato - Light espresso brightened with a milky latte, drizzled with sweet caramel. 

French Vanilla - Frothed coffee infused with soft vanilla beans and a brilliant dark sugar finish. 

Double Double - Expressive notes of richly brewed espresso impressed with sweet dark sugar.

entry.title: Vaping Dream - Tobaccoland - Pipes (5 Flavors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Vaping Dream
Price: 58.99 - 109.99 (14 variants)

VanGo's unique signature blend of tobacco that comes to your door all at once. This bundle comes with our top pipe tobaccos (5 flavors).

Spring Vanilla - Aged Virginia and Cavendish tobacco blended and topped off with a layer of sweet vanilla.

Golden Honey - Virginia tobacco with a hint of Black Cavendish, layered with honey & vanilla.

Silky Smooth - Creamy Virginia tobacco with a rich, buttery caramel after note.

Midnight Berries - A light blend of various tobaccos infused with wild berries, black currant & blackberries.

VCT - This award winning flavor is a combination of fresh & mild tobacco with a sweet & rich vanilla custard base.

entry.title: Vaping Dream - Tobaccoland Cigars (4 Flavors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Vaping Dream
Price: 48.99 - 90.99 (14 variants)

Full collection of the Tobaccoland Cigar lineup (4 flavors). A rich collection of different cigar style e-juice flavors bursting with richness.

Pirate - A combination of earthy nuts and an assortment of the best tobaccos steeped in oak barrels.

Captain - Tobacco infused with rich & smoky cocoa as well as touches of creamy, sweet caramel.

Anarchy - A robust tobacco flavor blend that is infused with fresh cherries.

Deadman - A rich & robust mix of Cavendish tobacco leaves with a strong earthy note for the true cigar lover.

entry.title: Vaping Dream - Frozen (9 Flavors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Vaping Dream
Price: 89.99 - 185.99 (14 variants)

Buy the full collection of the Frozen lineup (9 flavors). Choose your nicotine strength and size to get started on finding your perfect menthol flavor! This cool collection of fruity mixes are all based off VanGo Vape's Signature Menthol blend - so don't miss out on this amazing deal!

Waterberry - This e-liquid is a blend of juicy watermelon, sweet strawberries and kiwi that will blow you away from the fruity explosion.

Melons - This flavor is a combination of fresh watermelon, juicy cantaloupe and honeydew infused with VanGo’s signature menthol blend.

Mango - Frozen Mango is a classic flavor where we sourced the juiciest tasting tropical mango with VanGo’s signature menthol blend to enjoy all year long.

Peaches - This flavor is a perfect all day vape for vapers seeking a smooth peach e-liquid that has a menthol kick to keep you cool and refreshed all year long.

Strawana - Frozen Strawana is a combination of juicy strawberries and a perfectly ripened banana infused with VanGo’s signature menthol blend, resulting in Frozen Strawana.

Grapes - A simple flavor, yet a satisfying and complex flavor of grape paired with VanGo’s signature menthol blend.

Blueberry - Fresh blueberries handpicked from the local market infused with VanGo’s signature menthol blend.

Sophene - This tropical e-liquid is the perfect combination of strawberries, pineapple and a drizzle of menthol.

Persicor - This flavor contains a medley of juicy peaches along with sharp, yet sweet blackcurrants and topped off with the signature VanGo cooling blend!

entry.title: Vaping Dream - International Delights (4 Flavors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Vaping Dream
Price: 48.99 - 90.99 (14 variants)

Full collection of the International Delights collection (4 flavors). A rich & creamy collection of iconic international desserts. 

Belgian Breakfast (previously Belgian Waffle) - Deliciously sweet Belgian Waffles with real Canadian Maple Syrup.

Coffee Delight (previously Tiramisu) - A rich creamy tone, awakened with a seductive aroma of Espresso that will leave you lingering for more. 

Strawberry Mess (previously Eton Mess) - Strawberry notes infused with a refreshing sweet fluffy Meringue mid notes & a finale of Creme Fraiche.

Cheesebake (previously Cheesecake) - Classic New York style cheesecake with hints of delectable vanilla.

entry.title: Vaping Dream - Quenchers (6 Flavors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Vaping Dream
Price: 67.99 - 133.99 (14 variants)

Full collection of the Soda Pop lineup (5 flavors). A sweet, mouth watering collection of different fruity soda blends. 

Blue Grazberry - A delicious blend of blueberry, raspberry, and a hint of white grape.

Cheeky Cherry (previously Cherry Cola) - A refreshing blend of Cola with juicy cherry undertones.

Get em Grape (previously Grape Drink) - Handpicked grapes from the vineyards to create a sweet and succulent grape flavor.

Fruity Blast - A mix of juicy watermelon, fresh blueberries and sweet strawberry.

Sweet Citrus - Sweet citrus is a combination of orange, tangerine, lemon and lime. A little on the sweeter rather than sour side.

Pinaculars - Juicy pineapples, layered with rich bananas and undertones of sweet coconut, that will teleport you to the sandy white beaches of the Caribbean.

entry.title: Frozen Strawana
entry.summary:

Type: Frozen
Price: 15.99 - 49.99 (19 variants)

Can’t decide if you want a menthol flavor with strawberry or banana? Why not have them both! Frozen Strawana is a combination of juicy strawberries and a perfectly ripened banana infused with VanGo’s signature menthol blend, resulting in Frozen Strawana.
